name: Highway to Hell
description:
This game is an entry for the "My First Game Jam Winter 2018" game jam.

Read the full development process here.

A platformer meant to be beaten in under five minutes.

Face a handful of different threats on your way down to the fiery pits of hell to seek out the horrible Hell Gate that is bringing nasty monsters to your world.

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

S - Attack
